newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Sonae confirms no plans for Tafisa buyout.
newsitem.headline: Sonae confirms no plans for Tafisa buyout.

text.p: Wood products group Sonae Industria confirmed on Tuesday that it had no plans to launch a buyout of its Spanish subsidiary Tafisa.
"The board of Sonae informs that, contrary to what some press reports state, it has no intention whatsoever of launching a public offer to buy (OPA) for Tafisa."
Sonae Industria holds 49.97 percent of Tafisa. The Spanish company had already denied that Sonae was planning a bid.
